hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that plundering #Zora's Domain# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #the Spirit Temple# is on the way of the hero.
hinted_locations: Spirit Temple Child Climb East Chest

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a #storm within Gerudo's Fortress# reveals #2 Deku Scrubs#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that #a Recovery Heart# can be found in #the Death Mountain Crater#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that #the Sacred Forest Meadow# is on the way of the hero.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that ##the Sacred Forest Meadow## has #2# major items.

HC (Malon).text: They say that catching #Big Poes# leads to #Bombs (10 pieces)#.

HC (Rock Wall).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

HC (Storms Grotto).text: They say that a rock on #a ledge in the valley# hides the #Royal Family's Tomb#.

HF (Cow Grotto).text: They say that upon the #Colossus's right and left hands# lie...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #Bombs (5 pieces)#.

HF (Near Market Grotto).text: They say that the #final treasure of Ice Cavern# is #a Red Rupee#.

HF (Open Grotto).text: They say that #Hyrule Castle# is on the path of #gold#.

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say Ganondorf's bolts can be reflected with glass or steel.

KF (Deku Tree Left).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #an Ice Trap# and #a Heart Container#.

KF (Outside Storms).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# teaches #the Song of Storms#.

KF (Storms Grotto).text: They say that #Kakariko Village# is on the path of #gold#.

Kak (Open Grotto).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Jail Key#.

LH (Lab).text: They say that #the Deku Tree# is on the way of the hero.

LH (Southeast Corner).text: They say that a #ravaged village# mourns with #the Bolero of Fire#.

LH (Southwest Corner).text: They say that the #Water Trial# protects Ganon's Tower.

LW (Bridge).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

LW (Near Shortcuts Grotto).text: They say that #Bombchus (10 pieces)# can be found in #the Market#.
hinted_locations: Market Treasure Chest Game Room 2 Top

SFM (Maze Lower).text: They say that slaying #40 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #Deku Nuts (5 pieces)#.

SFM (Saria).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Piece of Heart#.

ToT (Left).text: They say that the #Frogs of Zora River# will reward you with...^ #a Shadow Temple Small Key# and #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

ToT (Right-Center).text: They say that #Biggoron# crafts #a Water Temple Small Key#.

ZD (Mweep).text: They say that #a Blue Rupee# can be found in #the Lost Woods#.
